name: sonam in the storm
description:
this is a short game i made for class as an experiment using Twine with Unity3D. it's also vaguely a prelude to a star trek fanfiction series i wanna make in the future. please enjoy!

instructions: use the mouse

music: Anything You Synthesize by The American Dollar

special thanks: Matt Rohr, for letting me dismantle & use his storytelling engine

I also used UnityTwine to make this so extra huge thanks to D.A. Terre for making it & documenting it so well.

~for my parents~
happy birthday Mom & Dad!!

update: fixed a typo, fixed the "reset", tweaked the photobike speed
update 2: fixed the exit button, also pressing "esc" will now quit the game

music used without permission, i dont own the rights (please support the band)
